Uses of Class
objenome.solver.evolve.grammar.GrammarRule

  • Packages that use GrammarRule 
    Package Description
    objenome.solver.evolve.grammar  

    • Uses of GrammarRule in objenome.solver.evolve.grammar

      Methods in objenome.solver.evolve.grammar that return GrammarRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GrammarRule GrammarRule.clone()
      Makes and returns a copy of this GrammarRule instance.
      GrammarRule Grammar.getGrammarRule(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a specific GrammarRule from this grammar, according to the name label of the rule.
      GrammarRule NonTerminalSymbol.getGrammarRule()
      Returns this non-terminal symbol's grammar rule.
      GrammarRule Grammar.getStartRule()
      Returns the root of the grammar parse tree.
      Methods in objenome.solver.evolve.grammar that return types with arguments of type GrammarRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<GrammarRule> Grammar.getGrammarRules()
      Returns a list of the grammar rules that make up this grammar.
      Methods in objenome.solver.evolve.grammar with parameters of type GrammarRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int NonTerminalSymbol.getNoNonTerminalSymbols(GrammarRule rule)
      Calculates and returns the number of non-terminal symbols that exist within the tree rooted at this non-terminal symbol which have the specified underlying GrammarRule.
      protected boolean Grammar.isInfinitelyRecursive(GrammarRule rule)
      Determines whether the given GrammarRule is infinitely recursive.
      NonTerminalSymbol NonTerminalSymbol.removeNthNonTerminal(int n, GrammarRule grammarRule)
      Removes the nth non-terminal with the given GrammarRule from the parse tree rooted at this NonTerminalSymbol instance, as counted using a pre-order traversal.
      Constructors in objenome.solver.evolve.grammar with parameters of type GrammarRule 
      Constructor and Description
      NonTerminalSymbol(GrammarRule grammarRule)
      Constructs a NonTerminalSymbol for the given GrammarRule.
      NonTerminalSymbol(GrammarRule grammarRule, java.util.List<Symbol> children)
      Constructs a NonTerminalSymbol for the given GrammarRule and with a list of child parse tree symbols.
